node.html:
• Develop new features. Could be product or tech related

  • Work on technical debts

  • Work on bug fix

  • Maintain all deployed modules in cloud environments.

  • Create metrics for our services, monitor alert and standby during on-call schedule.

  • Mostly code on: Ruby on Rails and Golang.

  • Maintaining the cycle of our development with CI/CD.

  • Containerised our application, and deploy it into Kubernetes Cluster managed by GKE using automated pipeline.
